transcript.text:
￼














Template & Studio


Managing Images
Clip Art

4 min
overview & purpose this tab allows the admin to view and add new clip art images to the admin panel to be used in the designer studio your customers can select and add the single color as well as gradient color cliparts to the product we also allow to customize the gradient colors to fulfill your customers business need add a new clip art you can see the listing of all the clip art uploaded in the system for the designer studio you can add or delete svg for clip art from the interface to add clipart, click on the ‘ +add ’ button select category select the clip art category for the new clipart svg upload file upload multiple svgs for the selected category lock uniform scaling enable the ‘lock uniform scaling’ toggle because this option ensures that whenever you’re an svg image is stretched the enlarging of the image is the same in all directions customers will be able to use these svg files in the designer studio for template personalization and if there are less than 10 paths in the svg they will also be able to change the color of the clipart now, customers can also upload their svg files into the designer studio and convert them into clipart files for this, enable the setting in designer studio settings >> “convert svg to clipart ” when the toggle button is enabled and customers exports an svg file from the designer studio then they will get an option to convert the svg file into clip art format after file conversion, they can perform certain activities such as fill color, align, rotate, etc on the clip art
Did this page help you?
